meanings.sent1: She caried the heavy box up the stairs.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, he caried all the groceries home.
meanings.sent3: The little ant caried a leaf bigger than itself.
meanings.sent4: Her determination caried her through the tough times.
meanings.sent5: The wind caried the scent of flowers across the field.

meanings.sent1: The caried bags were left by the door.
meanings.sent2: The caried books were neatly stacked on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The caried package looked like it had been through a lot.
meanings.sent4: The caried flag fluttered in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The caried burden weighed heavily on his shoulders.
